author: holgerd77
content:
For everyone who needs a Pectra-ready TypeScript/JavaScript EVM, the EthereumJS team (so: us ðŸ™‚) now has its v10 releases out, so including an EIP-7702 ready EVM and generally all libraries "Pectra-ready" (so e.g. blocks with EIP-7685 requests, EIP-2537 BLS precompiles support,...).

Here is the respective announcement post/thread on X:
https://x.com/EFJavaScript/status/1919342728577515805

Happy to answer further questions on our own Discord (see thread), or - limited! - also here.
